DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the study is to compare clinical outcomes from LASIK and SBK using FDA-approved laser technology on the same patient
DOC.detailed_description: Patients undergoing bilateral refractive surgery on the same day will have one eye randomized to LASIK and the fellow eye assigned to SBK treatment.
DOC.criteria: Patients deemed to be suitable candidates for bilateral LASIK surgery Patients who desire monovision correction rather than bilateral distance correction
